name: Choices
description: Composite export for multiple choice helpers.

use: you need single- or multi-select choice groups.
you want a shorthand alias for `MultipleChoice`.
avoid: a radio group or select is a better fit.

examples.minimal:
Choices<String>(
  value: 'A',
  onChanged: (value) {},
  child: const Text('Provide choice items here'),
)

accessibility: Ensure selectable items have clear labels.
dont: Use for very large option sets.
